column4: ﻿I ﻿﻿have tried everything to get wireless to work with this Ubuntu.  I have installed the RTL8187b Win 98 driver files with ndiswrapper, I have made sure that they start up when the computer boots, and I have blacklisted the r8180 Linux driver.
With what wireless card or chipset?
RTL8186b is my card, however, RTL8187b is what I am suppossed to use.
RTL81876b is my card, however, I am suppossed to use RTL8187b, as it is more common.
